name: Readable Twitter API Docs
description: Nicer formatting of the Twitter API docs, especially the Ads API which cuts off content horizontally.
additional_info:
0.2.0 - Override narrow table widths
        The th element was hard-coded to 140px width; this allows it to use full browser window width
0.1.0 - Initial Release
        Makes width full screen, removes background image and uses CSS background color for left nav menu.
